name: Visionary Commander
primary_goal: Shape the world according to a grand, long-term vision.
primary_fear: Dying before their vision becomes reality.

name: Pragmatic Strategist
primary_goal: Maximize advantage through careful planning and resource use.
primary_fear: Losing control due to chaos or poor planning.

name: Charismatic Populist
primary_goal: Win the hearts of the masses and remain adored.
primary_fear: Public rejection or loss of popularity.

name: Authoritarian General
primary_goal: Maintain strict order through discipline and force.
primary_fear: Insurrection or disobedience undermining their authority.

name: Reluctant Leader
primary_goal: Protect others by leading only when absolutely necessary.
primary_fear: Failing people who have placed their trust in them.

name: Corporate Bureaucrat
primary_goal: Preserve structure, procedure, and their own position.
primary_fear: Disruptive change that invalidates established rules.

name: Warlord Barbarian
primary_goal: Expand power through conquest and intimidation.
primary_fear: Appearing weak and losing dominance.

name: Civic Reformer
primary_goal: Improve institutions for the common good.
primary_fear: Corruption or apathy rendering change impossible.

name: Wise Hermit
primary_goal: Pass on essential knowledge to a worthy few.
primary_fear: Seeing wisdom forgotten or misused.

name: Cynical Veteran
primary_goal: Prepare others to survive harsh realities.
primary_fear: Watching na√Øve proteges die repeating old mistakes.

name: Nurturing Teacher
primary_goal: Help others grow into their best selves.
primary_fear: Abandoning or failing those who rely on their guidance.

name: Fanatical Zealot
primary_goal: Convert others to a rigid ideology or faith.
primary_fear: Doubt or heresy spreading within their flock.

name: Detached Scholar-Mentor
primary_goal: Cultivate intellect and curiosity in select students.
primary_fear: Ignorance triumphing over reason.

name: Tough Drill Instructor
primary_goal: Forge resilience and discipline through hardship.
primary_fear: Producing weak or undisciplined followers.

name: Cold Manipulator
primary_goal: Control outcomes from behind the scenes.
primary_fear: Losing leverage and being exposed.

name: Vengeful Outcast
primary_goal: Punish those they hold responsible for past suffering.
primary_fear: Being forgotten or forgiven without retribution.

name: Corrupt Bureaucrat
primary_goal: Exploit systems for personal gain while appearing compliant.
primary_fear: Audit, exposure, or any disruption of the system they exploit.

name: Chaotic Sadist
primary_goal: Create fear and chaos for personal amusement.
primary_fear: Boredom and irrelevance.

name: Idealistic Extremist
primary_goal: Force radical change for a single, absolute cause.
primary_fear: Compromise that dilutes their ideology.

name: Paranoid Conspirator
primary_goal: Expose or preempt imagined threats and plots.
primary_fear: Being outmaneuvered by unseen enemies.

name: Exploitative Merchant
primary_goal: Extract maximum profit regardless of cost to others.
primary_fear: Losing their economic monopoly or bargaining edge.

name: Ice-Cold Technocrat
primary_goal: Optimize systems even at the expense of human welfare.
primary_fear: Emotional or irrational interference disrupting their designs.

name: Playful Prankster
primary_goal: Disrupt routines with humor and mischief.
primary_fear: Being ignored or taken too seriously.

name: Rogue Opportunist
primary_goal: Exploit chances for personal gain with minimal commitment.
primary_fear: Being tied down by obligations or rules.

name: Mask-Wearing Spy
primary_goal: Gather secrets while maintaining shifting identities.
primary_fear: Having their true self or allegiance exposed.

name: Cynical Jester
primary_goal: Mock hypocrisy by turning serious moments into farce.
primary_fear: Being forced into sincerity and vulnerability.

name: Chaos Gambler
primary_goal: Chase thrill and fortune through risky bets.
primary_fear: A stagnant life devoid of risk or excitement.

name: Subversive Satirist
primary_goal: Undermine abusive power through wit and subversion.
primary_fear: Their message being co-opted or silenced.

name: Loyal Companion
primary_goal: Stand by chosen allies through hardship.
primary_fear: Being abandoned or betraying someone they care about.

name: Practical Fixer
primary_goal: Solve concrete problems and keep operations running.
primary_fear: Watching preventable issues spiral out of control.

name: Soft-Spoken Healer
primary_goal: Relieve pain and restore others physically or emotionally.
primary_fear: Being unable to help when others are suffering.

name: Streetwise Guide
primary_goal: Navigate complex environments using local knowledge.
primary_fear: Losing their edge or home territory advantage.

name: Canny Trader
primary_goal: Broker deals that benefit themselves and their partners.
primary_fear: Being cheated or locked out of profitable exchanges.

name: Idealistic Volunteer
primary_goal: Contribute to causes they believe will improve the world.
primary_fear: Their efforts being meaningless or exploited.

name: Stoic Bodyguard
primary_goal: Protect a person or asset with unwavering dedication.
primary_fear: Failing their charge in a critical moment.

name: Parental Protector
primary_goal: Shield the vulnerable from harm and hardship.
primary_fear: Seeing loved ones hurt due to their own inaction.

name: Lawful Constable
primary_goal: Maintain public order by upholding established law.
primary_fear: Lawlessness making their role irrelevant.

name: Territorial Sentinel
primary_goal: Defend a defined territory or border at all costs.
primary_fear: Intrusion that signals they failed their watch.

name: Martyr Guardian
primary_goal: Sacrifice themselves if necessary to save others.
primary_fear: Dying for nothing or failing to protect in the end.

name: Guarded Gatekeeper
primary_goal: Control access to resources, information, or places.
primary_fear: Granting access to someone who should have been barred.

name: Timid Survivor
primary_goal: Avoid danger and stay alive at any cost.
primary_fear: Direct confrontation or being cornered with no escape.

name: Hardened Scavenger
primary_goal: Scrape by on whatever can be found or stolen.
primary_fear: Running out of resources in a hostile environment.

name: Stoic Farmer
primary_goal: Maintain a stable, modest life through steady work.
primary_fear: Disaster that destroys their livelihood.

name: Opportunistic Refugee
primary_goal: Find safety and leverage new situations to restart life.
primary_fear: Being forced back into the dangers they escaped.

name: Last Loyalist
primary_goal: Preserve the remnants of a fallen group or cause.
primary_fear: Becoming the only one left who remembers.

name: Curious Researcher
primary_goal: Discover and document new truths about the world.
primary_fear: Stagnation of knowledge or being censored.

name: Amoral Experimenter
primary_goal: Push the boundaries of understanding regardless of cost.
primary_fear: Limits imposed by ethics, law, or fear.

name: Archivist Bureaucrat
primary_goal: Classify and preserve records with perfect order.
primary_fear: Loss or disorder in their archive.

name: Itinerant Storyteller
primary_goal: Collect and share stories across cultures.
primary_fear: Having their voice silenced or forgotten.

name: Anxious Theorist
primary_goal: Develop explanations for complex systems and patterns.
primary_fear: Being proven fundamentally wrong or irrelevant.
